2000_2009.title: Osama
2000_2009.plot: After the rise of the Taliban in Afghanistan and the restriction of women in public life, a pre-teen girl is forced to masquerade as a boy in order to find work to support her mother and grandmother.

2000_2009.title: Earth and Ashes

2000_2009.title: Kabuli kid
2000_2009.plot: A woman in a light-blue chadri abandons her infant in the backseat of a cab in the bustling streets of post-war Kabul.

2000_2009.title: Zolykha's Secret
2000_2009.plot: A rural Afghan family struggles to survive during the last, brutal year of the Taliban and the beginning of a new war that still rages. With war and conflict threatening their existence, the family copes by finding meaning in life's tragedies.

2010_2012.title: The Black Tulip
2010_2012.plot: The Mansouri family opens up a new restaurant after the fall of the Taliban in Kabul, Afghanistan only to be subsequently targeted by factional Taliban elements.

2016_2018.title: Hassan - The image of our common pain
